message.original: うっ――！ マスター、どうか私にチャンスを――！
message.translation: Yes! Master gave me a chance!

message.original: おぉ！ お目にかかれて光栄です！ 覚者様！！
message.translation: Oh! It is an honor to meet you! Arisen!!

message.original: 覚者様！ どうか我がマスターに！ 私に活躍の機会を！
message.translation: Arisen! As you are my master I will find an opportunity in your activities!

message.original: 忠誠の心なら、誰にも負けません！
message.translation: By the loyalty of my heart, it will not lose to anyone!

message.original: 粉骨砕身！ いかなる困難にも、共に立ち向かう所存！
message.translation: I will exert effort! With any kind of difficuly, I am willing to contront it!

message.original: 準備万端、何でもやりますよ！
マスター！ さぁ！！ 何でもお言いつけください！
message.translation: Master! Come on!! Please order me anything!

message.original: 冒険の際はぜひお伴を！ 作りたいものがあれば、何でもご要望を！
message.translation: I'll accompany you as it is the time of adventure! If there is something that you want, make whatever your request!

message.original: クラフト作業は順調です、マスター！ ご安心を！

message.original: 気合い十分で作業にかかっています！
message.translation: Ten minutes will depend on the fighting spirit of my work!

message.original: 心配は要りません、完了まで万事お任せを！
message.translation: Do not worry, leaving everything to me!

message.original: うおおお、マスター！ 救って頂き面目次第もありません！！
message.translation: Whooo, master! Save as we do not have any atonement!!

message.original: マスター！！ くううっ――！ 必ずやこのご恩に報います！
message.translation: Master!! Kuu~ Surely this reward is kindness!

message.original: 異界の狭間に、わざわざ私などのために――！ 我がマスターはなんと慈悲深い方だ――！ 一層励み、お守りしなければ――
message.translation: In between of another world, you got out of your way for such as me! My master is merciful! You are encouriging me more if you do not observe.
